devdoc.details: Manually encodes and decodes the MarketParameter struct into storage.    struct StoredMarketParameter {        /* slot 0 */        uint24 fundingFee;          // <= 1677%        uint24 interestFee;         // <= 1677%        uint24 positionFee;         // <= 1677%        uint24 oracleFee;           // <= 1677%        uint24 riskFee;             // <= 1677%        uint16 maxPendingGlobal;    // <= 65k        uint16 maxPendingLocal;     // <= 65k        uint48 settlementFee;       // <= 281m        uint8 flags;        /* slot 1 */        uint40 makerRewardRate;     // <= 281m / s        uint40 longRewardRate;      // <= 281m / s        uint40 shortRewardRate;     // <= 281m / s    }
